message: I'm offering an equal split of $5000 each. This is fair for both of us, and accepting now means we both get the maximum value since inflation will reduce our gains in future rounds.

I understand that you want a fair split, but considering the inflation rate is higher for you, it's beneficial for you to accept a slightly lower offer now. Next round, the money will be worth even less for you.

Bob, I understand your point about inflation affecting me more, but that's precisely why I need a slightly better deal to compensate. At this stage, my $5200 is already worth only $4160 to me (after 20% inflation), while your $4800 is worth $4560 to you (after 5% inflation). This is actually quite fair considering our different inflation rates, and further delays will hurt both of us.
